description: A Good XML Abstraction. Provides a common interface to popular XML libaries. Currently supports elementree and minidom. Tutorials are available at www.xkenneth.comgxml

info.Keywords:: python xml elementtree lxml minidom xpath ironpython

longdescription: A Good XML Abstraction. Provides a common interface to popular XML libaries. Currently supports elementree and minidom. Tutorials are available at www.xkenneth.comgxml
